name: Police Car: Chase Driving
description:
Your main objective in this extreme police car new game is to destroy all the criminal mafia, arrest them and put them behind the bars in these cop driving games by using your effective detective and super police driving skills. Get a real thrilling extreme police car driving simulator new games experience and with this amazing police car chase the criminals and become a real police car skillful driver in these fast police car chase 3d games. Take a real risk of driving 4x4 police driving on risky roads and go with full speed chase the criminal’s jeep simulator in this police jeep games 3d.

Feature:
- Eye catching 3D graphics
- Realistic car driving physics
- Awesome real looking cars
- Extremely addictive gameplay
- Best time killer game
